title: 12/14/21  DPS Hour 2 Bruce Arians and Bryce Young
itunes:title: 12/14/21  DPS Hour 2 Bruce Arians and Bryce Young
description:
Bruce Arians tells Dan that he will make a decision on Antonio Brown this week. Bruce says that he thought the team would gel this season and was ahead of schedule when they got on that playoff roll last season. Bryce Young tells Dan that he and the Heisman Trophy are still in New York. Bryce says he got a chance to go see the Knicks play while in New York for the Heisman Trophy ceremony.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bruce Arians tells Dan that he will make a decision on Antonio Brown this week. Bruce says that he thought the team would gel this season and was ahead of schedule when they got on that playoff roll last season. Bryce Young tells Dan that he and the Heisman Trophy are still in New York. Bryce says he got a chance to go see the Knicks play while in New York for the Heisman Trophy ceremony.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
